name: Zombie Drift
description:
Will you beat all levels and become the drift killer? Zombies are everywhere! Unfortunately, you don’t have any weapon. But you do have a car! Now show those zombies who is the boss and show your drifting skills!!!

Features:

- Beautiful graphics
- Car Garage with 9 cars available to choose from.
- Many hand made levels
- Endless drifting and cool zombies
- And many more...
